alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:38AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bayfield, northeastern Douglas, west central Iron, east central Washburn, Ashland and Sawyer Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 137 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Wing, to near Ino, to Little Round Lake, to Radisson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Port Wing, Herbster, Benoit and Ino around 145 AM CDT. Chippewa Flowage East around 150 AM CDT. Barksdale and Cornucopia around 155 AM CDT. Ashland, Washburn, Namekagon, Namekagon Lake and Bayfield Peninsula Sea Caves around 200 AM CDT. La Pointe, Sand Island and Clam Lake around 205 AM CDT. Bayfield, Red Cliff and York Island around 210 AM CDT. Mellen, Marengo, Madeline Island and Glidden around 215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Big Bay State Park, Reserve, Northwoods Beach, Bad River Reservation, Mouth Of Brule, Stockton Island, Ojibwa, Ghost Lake, High Bridge and Totagatic Flowage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron; Sawyer; Washburn
